org.cougaar.core.component
Class ServiceFilterBinder

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.core.component.BinderBase
      org.cougaar.core.component.BinderWrapper
          org.cougaar.core.component.ServiceFilterBinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Binder, BindingSite, ContainerAPI, StateObject, SubscriptionLifeCycle, GenericStateModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
PluginSanityBinder.Enforcer
public abstract class ServiceFilterBinder
extends BinderWrapper

A Wrapper Binder contructed by ServiceFilter which watches service requests and has convenient overridable points where extensions may monitor, edit, veto or wrap services requested by the client.

Specific implementations still will need to implement getBinderProxy so the right methods are presented

For an example of using this, see the class org.cougaar.core.examples.PluginServiceFilter in core/examples (part of the core cougaar documentation/development package).

Method Detail

setBindingSite

public void setBindingSite(BindingSite bs)
Overrides:
setBindingSite in class BinderBase

createContainerProxy

protected ContainerAPI createContainerProxy()
define to choose the class of the BinderProxy. Should usually be an extension of ServiceFilterBinderProxy. The default creates and returns an instance of ServiceFilterContainerProxy.

getContainerProxy

protected ContainerAPI getContainerProxy()
Defines a pass-through insulation layer to ensure that the plugin cannot downcast the BindingSite to the Binder and gain control via introspection and/or knowledge of the Binder class. This is neccessary when Binders do not have private channels of communication to the Container.

Overrides:
getContainerProxy in class BinderWrapper

createFilteringServiceBroker

protected abstract ServiceBroker createFilteringServiceBroker(ServiceBroker sb)
Define to choose the implementatino of the service broker filter, which should be an extension of FilteringServiceBroker. This method is called when setBindingSite is invoked.

getFilteringServiceBroker

protected ServiceBroker getFilteringServiceBroker()
